mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, title, subtitle, goal_amount, current_amount, status, start_date, end_date FROM project
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO project (user_id, subtitle, status) VALUES (#{userId}, #{subtitle}, #{status})
mapper.update: UPDATE project SET title = #{title}, subtitle = #{subtitle}, goal_amount = #{goalAmount}, current_amount = #{currentAmount}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
